txt.en: 'Among the remains of the creatures that we have dispatched, several chain-links have been recovered. These links hold the key to the travesty that has occured here.\n\n'Will you bring me any of these links that you may find while dispatching the wights plaguing Plas-maru?'

'Sadly, these chains are indeed the ones that were gifted to the Dievlig. I feared that this might be so.\n\n'I am unsure how this has been done, but we must do what we can to prevent our ancestors' bodies from being befouled further.'
'Bring me any chain links that you find upon the wights.'
Wights have arisen in the Bonevales, presenting a terrible threat to all who dwell in Dunland.
Chain-links may be found on wights outside Plas-maru, east of Ilar's camp.\n\nIlar has asked you to recover chain-links from fallen wights.
Talk to Ilar at his camp in the Bonevales
Ilar is at his camp, west of Plas-maru.\n\nYou should bring the chain-links that you recovered to Ilar.
